summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Human Resources, authorizing applications to and agreements with the Washington State Planning and Community Affairs Agency and the Washington State Department of Social and Health Services for financial assistance under Title IV of the Energy Conservation and Production Acts and Title IV of the Social Security Act for the operation of a Low-Income Weatherization Assistance program; increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1980 Budget of said Department and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Operating Fund.
